GREEN AXIS

Green Axis converts waste materials into near virgin raw materials for the plastic manufacturing companies in Nigeria...

Green Axis

Our mission is to proffer a sustainable waste management practices by providing door to door waste disposal services while making available sufficient supply and top quality recyclable materials for reprocessing into new end product. In addition, we would introduce a digital database to manage the individual contribution of our target population and promote a high performance, efficient and flexible workforce.


Our vision is to be a substantial proponent of the transition from Nigerianâ€™s low participation in waste recycling to the use of efficient waste management technology and delivery of zero waste status which is in line with the 17 SDG's of the United Nations. H) Use of funds: we will be able to divert additional 20 tonnes of recyclables away from landfill monthly, currently we divert over 15-25 tonnes of waste, and employ over 17 young people and also provides 120 indirect jobs through waste collectors ( Youths, sit-at-home women, scavengers, waste contractors) who sell to Green Axis on a regular.
